html:
Dec 7 (Reuters) - Securities analysts revised their ratings and price targets on several European companies, including Alstria Office REIT, Arkema and Clariant, on Tuesday.


HIGHLIGHTS

* Alstria Office REIT AG AOXG.DE: JP Morgan cuts to neutral from overweight

* Arkema SA AKE.PA: JP Morgan cuts to neutral from overweight

* Clariant AG CLN.S: JP Morgan raises to neutral from underweight

* Covestro AG 1COV.DE: JP Morgan raises to neutral from underweight

* OCI NV OCI.AS: JP Morgan raises to overweight from neutral

Following is a summary of research actions on European companies reported by Reuters on Tuesday. Stock entries are in alphabetical order.


* AB Foods ABF.L: BofA Global Research raises price objective to 1,750p from 1,700p

* ABB Ltd ABBN.S: Bernstein initiates with outperform rating and CHF 38 target price

* Abitare In SpA ABIT.MI: Midcap Partners cuts PT to EUR 8.9 from EUR 9.1; rating buy

* Abrdn Plc ABDN.L: Barclays cuts target price to 245p from 315p

* AJ Bell AJBA.L: Barclays cuts target price to 370p from 380p

* Allianz SE ALVG.DE: HSBC raises target price to EUR 270 from EUR 265

* Alstria Office REIT AG AOXG.DE: JP Morgan cuts to neutral from overweight

* Alstria Office REIT AG AOXG.DE: JP Morgan raises target price to EUR 19.5 from EUR 16.5

* Arkema SA AKE.PA: JP Morgan cuts to neutral from overweight

* Ashtead Group Plc AHT.L: Citigroup raises price target to 7,300p from 7,000p

* Assa Abloy AB ASSAb.ST: Bernstein initiates with outperform rating and SEK 316 PT

* AstraZeneca AZN.L: Jefferies cuts to hold from buy, cuts target to 9100p from 9950p

* Atlas Copco AB ATCOa.ST: Bernstein initiates with underperform rating and SEK 460 PT

* Atlas Copco AB ATCOa.ST: UBS raises target price to SEK 640 from SEK 580

* Atlas Copco AB ATCOa.ST: UBS raises to buy from neutral

* Aurubis AG NAFG.DE: BofA Global Research raises price objective to EUR 71 from EUR 61

* Barclays BARC.L: Deutsche Bank cuts target price to 240p from 250p

* Barclays BARC.L: Deutsche Bank cuts to hold from buy

* BASF SE BASFn.DE: JP Morgan raises to overweight from neutral

* Bayer AG BAYGn.DE: Citigroup cuts target price to EUR 48 from EUR 51

* Clariant AG CLN.S: JP Morgan raises to neutral from underweight

* CNH Industrial CNHI.MI: Bernstein initiates with outperform rating and EUR 18 PT

* Compagnie Des Alpes SA CDAF.PA: Portzamparc raises target price to EUR 16 from EUR 15.8

* Compagnie Des Alpes SA CDAF.PA: Portzamparc raises to buy from hold

* Covestro AG 1COV.DE: JP Morgan raises to neutral from underweight

* Dassault Systemes DAST.PA: Bernstein initiates with market perform rating and EUR 47 PT

* Drax Group Plc DRX.L: HSBC raises target price to 720p from 620p

* DSV DSV.CO: Goldman Sachs adds to conviction list

* Halfords Group Plc HFD.L: Peel Hunt raises target price to 525p from 480p

* Harbour Energy Plc HBR.L: Stifel raises target price to 630p from 490p

* Harbour Energy Plc HBR.L: Stifel raises to buy from hold

* Vantage Towers AG VTWRn.DE: HSBC raises target price to EUR 31 from EUR 27

* Wavestone SA WAVE.PA: Midcap Partners raises target price to EUR 60 from EUR 49

* Wavestone SA WAVE.PA: Portzamparc raises PT to EUR 51.7 from EUR 47.3; rating hold
